Group Event Request
Tell Us about Your Group Event & We Will Get In touch With You Soon!

â¦ Required
Looking to plan or book a group event? Reserve yours at Rum Bucket Bar and Grill.
Birthday parties:
Rum Bucket Bar and Grill is a great place to celebrate a birthday, with a lively atmosphere and a menu that has something for everyone. You can call the restaurant ahead of time to let them know that you are celebrating a birthday, and they may be able to accommodate you with a special table or seating area.
Bachelor and bachelorette parties:
Rum Bucket Bar and Grill is also a popular spot for bachelor and bachelorette parties. The restaurant has a full bar with a wide selection of drinks, and the menu includes a variety of appetizers and entrees that are perfect for sharing.
Rehearsal dinners:
Rum Bucket Bar and Grill is a great place to host a rehearsal dinner. The restaurant has a private dining room that can accommodate up to 50 guests. The restaurant's staff can work with you to create a custom menu for your event, and they can also help you with decorations and other details.
Corporate events:
Rum Bucket Bar and Grill is a great place to host a corporate event, such as a holiday party or a team-building event. The restaurant has a variety of spaces that can be rented for private events, and the staff can help you to plan and execute your event perfectly.
Club events:
Rum Bucket bar & Grill is perfect for all types of club events. From mom's groups to car clubs, everyone is sure to have a great time.
If you are interested in reserving a space at Rum Bucket Bar and Grill for a party or group event, please fill out our contact form and our events staff will be happy to answer your questions and help you to book your event.
Here are some additional tips for planning a party or group event at Rum Bucket Bar and Grill:
Book your event in advance:
Rum Bucket Bar and Grill is a popular restaurant, so it is important to book your event in advance, especially if you are planning to host your event during peak season.
Provide the restaurant with a headcount:
It is important to provide the restaurant with a headcount for your event so that they can adequately prepare.
Discuss your dietary restrictions with the restaurant:
The restaurant's staff can help you to create a menu that accommodates any dietary restrictions that your guests may have.
Decorate the space:
If you are renting a private dining room, you are welcome to decorate the space to match your event theme.
Relax and have fun!:
The staff at Rum Bucket Bar and Grill is here to make sure that you and your guests have a wonderful time. So relax, have fun, and enjoy your party!

About Us
Rum Bucket Bar & Grill is a restaurant in Ft. Myers, Florida with indoor and outdoor dining, a full-service bar, and a menu featuring hamburgers, sandwiches, steak, seafood, gator and more!
Online Ordering
You can now get your Rum Bucket favorites to-go! We now offer Online Ordering with Take-Out or Delivery!
Order Online Now!
We Can Host Your Event!
Birthday party, anniversary, club or corporate event?
Group Event Request
The Rum Bucket Rewards
Earn points that go toward discounts for dining at your favorite Ft. Myers bar and grill!
Join Rewards Program
Online Waitlist
If you and your party are ready, you can join our waitlist online:
Join the Waitlist!
